attributes.action: rid our roads of speed humps which cause pain and despair to many people with medical problems and disabilities.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There isn't any speed I can drive over a speed hump without causing pain and distress to my wife who has degenerative bone disease.  People with arthritis and other crippling complaints suffer needlessly every time they go out on the road.  We ask for them to be removed.
